Not <WG3361> Therefore <WG3767> Be <WG1096> Joint Partakers <WG4830> With Them; <WG846>

<WG1223> On This Account <WG5124> <WG3361> Be Not <WG1096> Foolish, <WG878> But <WG235> Understanding <WG4920> What <WG5101> The <WG3588> Will <WG2307> Of The <WG3588> Lord Is. <WG2962>
And <WG2532> <WG3361> Be Not Drunk <WG3182> With Wine, <WG3631> In <WG1722> Which <WG3739> Is <WG2076> Dissoluteness; <WG810> But <WG235> Be Filled <WG4137> With The <WG1722> Spirit, <WG4151>

Speaking <WG2980> To Each Other <WG1438> In Psalms <WG5568> And <WG2532> Hymns <WG5215> And <WG2532> Songs <WG5603> Spiritual, <WG4152> Singing <WG103> And <WG2532> Praising <WG5567> With <WG1722> <WG3588> Heart <WG2588> Your <WG5216> To The <WG3588> Lord; <WG2962>

That <WG2443> He Might Present <WG3936> It <WG846> To Himself <WG1438> Glorious <WG1741> The <WG3588> Assembly, <WG1577> Not <WG3361> Having <WG2192> Spot, <WG4696> Or <WG2228> Wrinkle, <WG4512> Or <WG2228> Any <WG5100> <WG3588> Of Such Things; <WG5108> ' But <WG235> That <WG2443> It Might Be <WG5600> Holy <WG40> And <WG2532> Blameless, <WG299>
